{"id":806511443,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1663899464,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1820 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/806511443/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Concatenation of Consecutive Binary Numbers","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const int M = 1e9 + 7;\n    \n    int concatenatedBinary(int n) {\n        int ans = 0, mul = 1;\n        for(int i=n; i>=0; i--){\n            int num = i;\n            while(num){\n                int rem = num & 1; num >>= 1;\n                ans = ((ans % M) + (rem * mul)%M)%M;\n                mul <<= 1;\n                mul = mul % M;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"concatenation-of-consecutive-binary-numbers","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
